about_the_game:
• Twin stick action shooter party game.

  • 8 Player Local Multiplayer (Controllers required)

  • 4 Player Steam Remote Play Multiplayer

  • Lots of weapon and ability combinations

  • Multiple Gamemodes: Free for all, Teams and more...

  • Character customization

The Game

Behold!!! The marvel that is Buhei, a gift bestowed upon humanity! Within its ethereal confines, the concept of limits fades into insignificance, replaced by an exquisite orchestration of gameplay features that transcend mortal comprehension.

Multiplayer

With an impressive capacity for up to 8 players to simultaneously join forces or engage in friendly rivalry, Buhei is THE party game. Bring all your friends. Bring all your foes. Marvel together at the divinly explosive action of Buhei.

Weapon Arsenal

And behold, the symphony of firepower – boasting a terrific weapon arsenal to unleash utter destruction upon your adversaries, ensuring an inexhaustible array of choices at your fingertips. From high-velocity projectiles to cunning traps that ensnare even the most shrewd of opponents, the arsenal in Buhei is a never ending cosmos of possibilities.

Crazy Abilities

Now, fortify yourself with a bountiful selection of techniques to outshine your opponents, each more exhilarating and unexpected than the last. Harness the power of elemental spells that twist the very fabric of reality or wield enchanted artifacts that defy the laws of physics, all while leaving your rivals in awe.

Maps

And just when you believed it couldn't possibly elevate further, the replayability soars with a majestic compilation of meticulously crafted maps, guaranteeing that each battle evolves into a fresh contest of might and wits.

Customize your Character

Prepare for an unparalleled journey of self-expression as you dive into a realm where the boundaries of customization are shattered, leaving behind a trail of stardust that defines your digital legacy. With a palette boasting with vibrant hues and a constellation of extraordinary facial features, the hail of possibilities that Buhei bestows upon you will leave you in disbelieve.

Jokes Aside:

Buhei is a fun twin stick shooter party game that is easy to pick up and one of the few games that can actually be played locally with up to 8 players.
